message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be extremely valuable to your business. My initial offer is $950,000. This price reflects the significant value I've put into developing it, but I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Let's discuss!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $820,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. However, $820,000 is simply too low to justify the value I've invested in this product.  I'm willing to come down to $880,000. This reflects a significant compromise on my end, and I believe it's a fair price that benefits both of us. Let's work together to make this deal happen.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After reviewing our current situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $860,000. I hope this proposal helps us reach an agreement that benefits both parties.
